Subjects normal ovarian reserve subdivide < 35 > /=35 year old subject poor ovarian reserve subdivide first subsequent cycle IVF subgroup analysis . Subjects normal poor ovarian reserve group randomize accord computer-generated randomization list seal envelope receive either DHEA 25mg three time day placebo throughout study period . Any change hormonal profile ovarian reserve assess above-mentioned blood test pelvic ultrasound scan repeat early follicle phase ( Day 2 3 ) two subsequent cycle . After two month DHEA/placebo treatment , subject give standard low dose ovarian stimulation 75 IU intramuscular human menopausal gonadotrophin ( HMG , MenogonÂ® , Ferring Pharmaceuticals ) daily 7 day . Blood test pelvic ultrasound scan repeat 7 day stimulation ( ie . day 10 11 ) .
